prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of an (imposing tall alien warrior:1.2), (emerald green biological skin:1.3), stern expression, turban and cape, intense focused eyes, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: detailed skin surface imperfections, (reptilian skin texture:1.2), (subtle wet sheen:1.1), source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching heavy cape fabric:1.2), sharp focus, cinematic lighting, film grain
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, smooth green skin, human face, fleshy features, flat lighting, low quality
